segments.text: I'm watching this poor woman, so lost in her routine.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She's meticulously drying that plate, completely focused.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's almost heartbreaking how unaware she is of the chaos around her.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The water is flowing freely, making a mess that sheâ€™ll eventually have to clean.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: All that effort she puts into her home, only for it to be undone by a simple oversight.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: And those children, while being a bit naughty, are also vulnerable on that wobbly stool.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It makes me a little sad to think of the trouble they might get into.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She looks so calm right now, but that peace is about to be shattered.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The contrast with the tidy garden outside makes the domestic disarray inside even more poignant.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She's just trying to do a simple chore, and disaster is looming.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wish I could reach in and just turn off that faucet for her.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's a quiet moment, but filled with an undercurrent of misfortune.
segments.speaker: PAR
